description.en: Daily COVID-19 cases at national and state level, with details on imported, recovered, active, and cluster cases.
description.bm: Kes COVID-19 harian di peringkat kebangsaan dan negeri, dengan butiran mengenai kes import, sembuh, aktif dan kluster.

variables.name: cases_new
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of new cases reported in the 24 hours since the last report; note that this is based on the date of report and not the date of the test.
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes baharu yang dilaporkan dalam 24 jam sejak laporan terakhir; angka ini adalah berdasarkan tarikh laporan dan bukannya tarikh ujian saringan.

variables.name: cases_import
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of new cases imported from abroad, i.e. inviduals who were infected outside the country
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes baharu yang datang dari luar negara, iaitu individu yang dijangkiti di luar negara

variables.name: cases_recovered
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of recoveries from COVID-19 reported in the 24 hours since the last report
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes sembuh yang dilaporkan dalam 24 jam sejak laporan terakhir

variables.name: cases_active
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of COVID-19 cases who have not recovered or died
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes COVID-19 yang belum sembuh ataupun mati

variables.name: cases_cluster
variables.desc_en: [Integer] Number of cases attributable to clusters; the difference between new cases and the sum of cases attributable to clusters is the number of sporadic cases
variables.desc_bm: [Integer] Bilangan kes yang boleh dikaitkan dengan sesebuah kluster; perbezaan antara kes baharu dan jumlah kes yang dikaitkan dengan kluster adalah bilangan kes sporadik

variables.name: Daily COVID-19 Cases by State
variables.desc_en: Daily COVID-19 cases at national and state level, broken down by vaccination status.
variables.desc_bm: Kes COVID-19 harian di peringkat kebangsaan dan negeri, dengan pecahan mengikut status vaksinasi.

en.methodology: This dataset is produced by the Crisis Preparedness and Response Centre (CPRC) at the Ministry of Health, based on daily ground-level surveillance conducted to monitor the evolution of COVID-19 in Malaysia. Following Malaysia's transition to endemicity, the public reporting frequency was altered from daily to weekly. Nevertheless, internal surveillance is still conducted on a daily basis.
en.caveat: In general, the data presented here is based on the date of report rather than the date of the event.
en.publication: KKMNOW features a [dashboard on COVID-19](https://data.moh.gov.my/dashboard/covid-19) where you can explore the data in a more interactive manner!

bm.methodology: Dataset ini dihasilkan oleh Pusat Kesiapsiagaan dan Tindak Cepat Krisis (CPRC) di Kementerian Kesihatan Malaysia, berdasarkan survelan harian di lapangan yang dilaksanakan untuk memantau evolusi COVID-19 di Malaysia. Berikutan peralihan Malaysia kepada fasa endemik, kekerapan pelaporan awam telah diubah daripada harian kepada mingguan. Namun begitu, survelan harian masih berlangunsung secara dalaman.
bm.caveat: Secara am, data ini adalah berdasarkan tarikh laporan dan bukannya tarikh kejadian.
bm.publication: Portal KKMNOW memaparkan [papan pemuka tentang COVID-19](https://data.moh.gov.my/dashboard/covid-19) di mana anda boleh menerokai data ini dengan lebih interaktif!
